Home » 39P6 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukadukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (6) » 1 Hetuduka, Duka
1.25 Hetuduka, Cittasamuṭṭhānaduka
Hetuduka, Duka
Hetuduka, Cittasamuṭṭhānaduka
49.
143Hetuṃ cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu cittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
144Hetuyā nava…pe…  avigate nava. (Sabbattha vitthāro.)
145Nahetuṃ nocittasamuṭṭhānaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nocittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Sabbattha ekaṃ.)
